mapper.sql: id, share_code, doc_code, share_type, passwd, expire_time, expire_type, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from doc_share where share_code = #{shareCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and del_flag!=1 limit 1

select
from doc_share where del_flag != 1 order by create_date desc

share_code = #{shareCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
